related_questions.question:
Mrs. Retno is my Biology techer. She is good techer.    She likes teching very much. Mrs. Terno is rather tall
(tinggi). She is abourt 165 cm. Her skin (kulitnya) is light
and she has wavy hair (keriting). Mr. Heru is a Math teacher.
he is fat (gemuk) and short. His skin is dark brown. He looks
very fierce (galak) but actually be is very good teacher, most
of the students like him.
a.
24. How many people are there in the text?
a. 2
b. 3
c. 4
d. 1
25. Does mrs. Retno have a light or black skin?
a. Yes, she does
c. Light skin
b. No, she doesn't d. Black skin
26. Who teaches (mengajar) Math?
Mr. Heru does
c. Mrs. Retno does
b. The writer does
d. The reader does
27. Who teaches Biology ?
a. The reader does c. Mrs. Retno does
b. Mr. Heru does
d. The writer does
28. Today is Sunday. The day after tomorrow is ....
a. Monday
c. Wednesday
b. Tuesday
d. Saturday​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

24. A. 2

25. C. light skin

26. A. Mr. Heru does

27. C. Mrs. Retno does

28. B. Tuesday

semoga terbantu, maap kalo salah. Kalo bener jangan lupa jadiin jawaban tercerdas yak✌

Jawaban:

24. B.3

25. B.She doesn't

26. A.Mr Heru does

27. C. Mrs Retno does

28. B. Tuesday

24. Mrs.Retno, Mrs.Terno, Mr. Heru

25. The one with the light skin is Mrs. Terno

26. Mr Heru is a math teacher

27. The biology teacher ia Mrs. Retno

28. Today : Sunday

Tommorow : Monday

After tommorow : Tuesday

related_questions.question:
8. what ...... you ....... now ?    a. is -- doing
 b. are - doing
c. am-doing 
d. were - doing

Bantu jawab lagi kakak Besok ujian saya harus di kumpul 

​

9. There are 3 books in my bag (+)
# there
3 books in my bag (-)​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

9. (+) There are 3 books in my bag.

(-) There are not 3 books in my bag.

(?) Are there 3 books in my bag?

Semoga membantu ^_^

Jawaban:

sebenarnya aku tidak bisa bantu jawab tapi,cara jawabnya itu yang di kotak bacaan "you" ada bacaan "time" jadi kamu tulis jamnya, dan bacaan "activities" kamu tulis aktivitas kamu pada jam itu, terus yang ada bacaan "your friend" itu aktivitas dan waktu dari teman kamu, "wake up" artinya bangun tidur

Penjelasan:

kalau kurang jelas silahkan tanyakan lagi..... :)
